n0:createOracleTrigger.n0:source:
CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TRIGGER "FCERNY"."BSA_TRIGGER_DELETE_PROJECT_TOOL" instead of DELETE on bsa_view_project_tool FOR EACH ROW BEGIN DELETE FROM bsa_project_tool WHERE project_id = :old.project_id AND tool_id = :old.tool_id; END;
/ / ALTER TRIGGER "FCERNY"."BSA_TRIGGER_DELETE_PROJECT_TOOL" ENABLE;
